I bought a tiny router!

Category: Website Tags: Bela Networking
Fri, Apr 08, 22 Length: 1 min

I’m hoping to use this thing as a dedicated access point for the Bela. From what I read here it shouldn’t be too hard of a process. Ideally I’d like to avoid using the school network for this project as I feel like it’s just going to end up in needless headaches.

Also please ignore how messy my room is.
